channel.title: Did you miss something?
channel.description:
![robin|40x48](upload://9oJUh8V0IgBzGcn9AlOTg1Vg6oF.png) **Yay**
*updated the website ⬡ https://conf.activitypub.rocks* … *We will be uploading the recordings of the live sessions from #apconf2020 to [conf.tube](https://conf.tube/video-channels/apconf_channel/videos) soon, but in the meantime, you can stream them from Big Blue Button* (**Firefox, Chrome**):
The recordings for **Question & Answer Sessions** are public, updated all the posts, see https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/tag/talk
The recording of the **Lightning Talks Round** can be found here
https://bbb.fosshost.org/playback/presentation/2.0/playback.html?meetingId=2dbbb31314ce3469c302e4c540e8f4807bf7ef01-1601832533158
https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/lightning-round-talks/955
:partying_face: and a little present by Chris at the [Hackathon](https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/activitypub-hackathon-2020/956): [**Walkthrough Petnames**](https://bbb.fosshost.org/playback/presentation/2.0/playback.html?meetingId=98a52b344136ed4e45fcac6481f6a18bb9354a6e-1601915922065) (Firefox, Chrome) ## ⬡ Did you miss something else? Please reply here …

item.title: Did you miss something?
item.dc:creator: Sebastian
item.description:
Yay

updated the website ⬡ https://conf.activitypub.rocks …
We will be uploading the recordings of the live sessions from #apconf2020 to conf.tube soon, but in the meantime, you can stream them from Big Blue Button (Firefox, Chrome):

The recordings for Question & Answer Sessions are public, updated all the posts, see
https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/tag/talk

The recording of the Lightning Talks Round can be found here

bbb.fosshost.org

Loading

Lightning Round Talks ActivityPub Conference 2020
The lightning talk session for #meeting:apconf2020 is scheduled on Sunday 4th. Room: https://bbb.fosshost.org/b/mor-qfh-vv1-ivq Lightning round talks will be under 5 minutes long and will hopefully include summaries of the BoF sessions as well as individual topics. Since a lot of the lightning round talks will include content from the same day’s BoFs, we can’t require early submission of slides etc, so you can share your screen on Big Blue Button if you’d like to include slides. Talk #-2: @m…

and a little present by Chris at the Hackathon: Walkthrough Petnames
(Firefox, Chrome)

⬡ Did you miss something else? Please reply here …
